attributes.action: Let MPs vote on the final decision to activate article 50 or not
attributes.background: This is a representative democracy. As the EU referendum results were very close and leave nearly as many disgruntled as as many happy, as well as many people's vote being based on lies from the leave campaign or prejudices, the government needs to accept the result as advisory, not a mandate.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
